live_updates: This issue has been resolved.  Thank you for your patience.
Our technicians continue to repair services through the night. We apologize for the extended disruption and thank you for your patience.
Tech crews are on site working towards a resolution.
Technical crews are dispatched to arrive on site to investigate this matter.
Our teams are looking into it. Please stay tuned for updates.
43893.summary: Some customers in Kildonan Crossing area of Winnipeg are experiencing an interruption to Internet, Television and Home Phone services. We are working to restore service as quickly as possible and apologize for any inconvenience this may cause.
43893.title: Nov 12 – Winnipeg ( Kildonan Crossing) | All Services - Outage (Resolved)
